00038 - (void)testSuccess {
00039   // This is just a test to ensure that you're building the unit tests properly.
00040   STAssertTrue(YES, @"Something is terribly, terribly wrong.");

00046 #pragma mark -
00047 #pragma mark Non-Retaining Collections
00048 
00049 
00051 - (void)testNonRetainingArray {
00052   NSMutableArray* array = NICreateNonRetainingArray();
00053   id testObject = [[NSArray alloc] init];
00054   NSUInteger initialRetainCount = [testObject retainCount];
00055 
00056   STAssertTrue(initialRetainCount > 0, @"Improper initial retain count");
00057 
00058   [array addObject:testObject];
00059   STAssertEquals([testObject retainCount], initialRetainCount, @"Improper new retain count");
00060 
00061   STAssertEquals([testObject retainCount], initialRetainCount,
00062                  @"Improper retain count after release");
00063 
00064   [array release];
00065   [testObject release];
00066 }
00067 
00068 
00070 - (void)testNonRetainingDictionary {
00071   NSMutableDictionary* dictionary = NICreateNonRetainingDictionary();
00072   id testObject = [[NSArray alloc] init];
00073   NSUInteger initialRetainCount = [testObject retainCount];
00074 
00075   STAssertTrue(initialRetainCount > 0, @"Improper initial retain count");
00076 
00077   [dictionary setObject:testObject forKey:@"obj"];
00078   STAssertEquals([testObject retainCount], initialRetainCount, @"Improper new retain count");
00079 
00080   STAssertEquals([testObject retainCount], initialRetainCount,
00081                  @"Improper retain count after release");
00082 
00083   [dictionary release];
00084   [testObject release];
00085 }
00086 
00087 
00089 - (void)testNonRetainingSet {
00090   NSMutableSet* set = NICreateNonRetainingSet();
00091   id testObject = [[NSArray alloc] init];
00092   NSUInteger initialRetainCount = [testObject retainCount];
00093 
00094   STAssertTrue(initialRetainCount > 0, @"Improper initial retain count");
00095 
00096   [set addObject:testObject];
00097   STAssertEquals([testObject retainCount], initialRetainCount, @"Improper new retain count");
00098 
00099   STAssertEquals([testObject retainCount], initialRetainCount,
00100                  @"Improper retain count after release");
00101 
00102   [set release];
00103   [testObject release];
00104 }

00109 #pragma mark -
00110 #pragma mark Non-Empty Collection Testing
00111 
00112 
00114 - (void)testIsArrayWithObjects {
00115   STAssertTrue(!NIIsArrayWithObjects(nil), @"nil should not be an array with items.");
00116 
00117   NSMutableArray* array = [[NSMutableArray alloc] init];
00118 
00119   STAssertTrue(!NIIsArrayWithObjects(array), @"This array should not have any items.");
00120 
00121   NSDictionary* dictionary = [[NSDictionary alloc] init];
00122   STAssertTrue(!NIIsArrayWithObjects(dictionary), @"This is not an array.");
00123 
00124   [array addObject:dictionary];
00125   STAssertTrue(NIIsArrayWithObjects(array), @"This array should have items.");
00126 
00127   [array release];
00128   [dictionary release];
00129 }
00130 
00131 
00133 - (void)testIsSetWithObjects {
00134   STAssertTrue(!NIIsSetWithObjects(nil), @"nil should not be a set with items.");
00135 
00136   NSMutableSet* set = [[NSMutableSet alloc] init];
00137 
00138   STAssertTrue(!NIIsSetWithObjects(set), @"This set should not have any items.");
00139 
00140   NSDictionary* dictionary = [[NSDictionary alloc] init];
00141   STAssertTrue(!NIIsSetWithObjects(dictionary), @"This is not an set.");
00142 
00143   [set addObject:dictionary];
00144   STAssertTrue(NIIsSetWithObjects(set), @"This set should have items.");
00145 
00146   [set release];
00147   [dictionary release];
00148 }
00149 
00150 
00152 - (void)testIsStringWithAnyText {
00153   STAssertTrue(!NIIsStringWithAnyText(nil), @"nil should not be a string with any text.");
00154 
00155   NSString* string = [[NSString alloc] init];
00156 
00157   STAssertTrue(!NIIsStringWithAnyText(string), @"This should be an empty string.");
00158 
00159   NSDictionary* dictionary = [[NSDictionary alloc] init];
00160   STAssertTrue(!NIIsStringWithAnyText(dictionary), @"This is not a string.");
00161 
00162   STAssertTrue(!NIIsStringWithAnyText(@""), @"This should be an empty string.");
00163   STAssertTrue(NIIsStringWithAnyText(@"three20"), @"This should be a string with text.");
00164 
00165   [string release];
00166   [dictionary release];
00167 }
00168 
00169 
00172 #pragma mark -
00173 #pragma mark CGRect Methods
00174 
00175 
00177 - (void)testCGRectMethods {
00178   CGRect rect = CGRectMake(0, 0, 100, 100);
00179 
00180   STAssertTrue(CGRectEqualToRect(CGRectMake(0, 0, 90, 90),
00181                                  NIRectContract(rect, 10, 10)),
00182                @"Contracting a rect should only modify the right and bottom edges.");
00183 
00184   STAssertTrue(CGRectEqualToRect(CGRectMake(10, 10, 90, 90),
00185                                  NIRectShift(rect, 10, 10)),
00186                @"Shifting a rect should only modify the left and top edges.");
00187 
00188   STAssertTrue(CGRectEqualToRect(CGRectMake(10, 10, 80, 80),
00189                                  NIRectInset(rect, UIEdgeInsetsMake(10, 10, 10, 10))),
00190                @"Insetting a rect should modify all edges.");
00191 }
